Group 1.last question: What is the title of the Invention? What category does the invention fall into? Choose all categories that apply to this invention

Group 2.last question: Can you provide the date and a description of when and how this Invention came to be?

Group 3.last question: What is the particular problem that the invention seeks to solve?

Existing technologies or products.last question: What advantage(s) does this invention provide over existing technologies or products?

Novel features and research plans.last question: What novel and/or unusual features distinguish this invention from existing technologies or products? What research plans do you have for further development of the invention?

Possible uses.last question: What are possible uses for the invention? List all possible commercial applications of the invention. In addition to immediate applications, are there other uses that might be realized in the future (i.e., other contemplated forms of the invention or alternate aspects/uses)?
